;arranged by Torchkas
#amk 2

#SPC {
	#title "Palace theme"
	#game "Zelda 2 (arranged)"
	#author "Koji Kondo, Torchkas"
	#comment "original MIDI 'z2temple'"
}

#path "Palace"

#samples {
	"ff6trumpet.brr"
	"ff6trombone.brr"
	"ff6string.brr"
	"ff6organ.brr"
	"ff6timpani.brr"
	"ff6snare.brr"
	"ff6cymbal.brr"
	"picollo.brr"
}

#instruments {
	"ff6trumpet.brr"	$00 $00 $DE $06 $02 ;@30
	"ff6trumpet.brr"	$00 $00 $BA $06 $02 ;@31
	"ff6trumpet.brr"	$00 $00 $B5 $06 $02 ;@32
	"ff6trumpet.brr"	$00 $00 $A9 $06 $02 ;@33
	"ff6trombone.brr"	$00 $00 $DD $04 $81 ;@34
	"ff6trombone.brr"	$00 $00 $BA $04 $81 ;@35
	"ff6trombone.brr"	$00 $00 $B6 $04 $81 ;@36
	"ff6trombone.brr"	$00 $00 $A9 $04 $81 ;@37
	"ff6timpani.brr"	$8F $E0 $00 $02 $30 ;@38
	"ff6string.brr"		$00 $00 $DA $03 $15 ;@39
	"ff6string.brr"		$00 $00 $B5 $03 $15 ;@40
	"ff6string.brr"		$8B $E0 $00 $03 $15 ;@41
	"ff6string.brr"		$89 $E0 $00 $03 $1E ;@42
	"ff6organ.brr"		$8E $E0 $00 $05 $EF ;@43
	"ff6snare.brr"		$8F $E0 $00 $07 $83 ;@44
	"ff6cymbal.brr"		$9F $6E $00 $04 $30 ;@45
	"picollo.brr"		$8F $E0 $00 $08 $02 ;@46
}
